message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $13,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit hesitant about selling to you, Bob. You're getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
